name: Mystic Crystal
description:
Mystic Crystal Play as a lonesome adventurer who explores many islands in the sky! Discover magic powerups as you try to find the ultimate Mystic Crystal!

Minimum Specs: 
Platform: PC 
OS: Windows 10 64-bit or MacOS 
RAM: 4GB 
Storage: 2GB of available space
Input: Keyboard & mouse or Xbox 360 controller
